text:
February
Twenty-eighth
19 4 0
Mr. M. 3. Ho vile
Radio Station WYNC
Municipal Broadoastlng System
New York City
Dear Novik:
X ran across the HPeople*s Forum" of the
Milwaukee Evening Post of January 15. I
thought you would be Interested in seeing
it. It is my understanding that the letter
was written for the Forum when the Mayor
was In Milwaukee but publication of it was
delayed.
Cordially yours,
Frank E. Sohooley
FES/rep
Enclosure
